Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-2492 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-2492 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package tensorflow is earlier than 2.16.1-11, affected by CVE-2026-2492
